mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reg_prov_http_cfg WHERE deleted = 0 AND lifecycle_status_code = 'ACTIVE' AND provenance_id = #{provenanceId} AND effective_from <= #{now} AND (effective_to IS NULL OR effective_to > #{now}) AND scope_code IN ('TASK', 'SOURCE') AND task_type_key IN (#{taskTypeKey}, 'ALL') ORDER BY IF(scope_code = 'TASK', 1, 2), IF(task_type_key = #{taskTypeKey}, 1, 2) , effective_from DESC, id DESC LIMIT 1
